message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get the rest. We can negotiate if you want, but I'm sure you can find better ways to spend $1000 than I can find to spend $9000.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer.  Let's both get a decent share.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40, with me taking 60% and you getting 40%. I think this is fair considering the inflation we're facing.
